title: Czech Republic: Citipujccka Voted Third-Best Loan Product on the Czech Market
summary: Prague - Citipůjcčka took third place in the 'Loans' category at the 2012 Financial Product competition, organized by analytical company Scott & Rose.
tag-1: Czech Republic: Citipujccka Voted Third-Best Loan Product on the Czech Market
tag-2: Prague – Citipůjcčka took third place in the 'Loans' category at the 2012 Financial Product competition, organized by analytical company Scott & Rose.
tag-3: Products in this category are evaluated according to RPSN, fees, necessity of current account opening, availability (branches) and insurance offering.
tag-4: The 2012 promotional offers for Citibank Europe plc clients, such as discount from the regular interest rate price list, no loan processing fee and the early repayment option free of charge, were highly regarded.
tag-5: The CitiLoan product offers a personal loan up to CZK 600,000 at very attractive interest rates, with no guarantor required. Applicants do not have to visit Citibank's branch personally; bankers meet clients at a place and date defined by them. You can apply for CitiLoan via online form at www.citibank.cz or at 844 555 666.
tag-6: The evaluator and announcer of the "Financial Product" competition is the analytical company Scott & Rose, the operator of Finparada.cz portal.
